name: ChatInterface-mxyzb-1703494630568

description.llm: A simple chat app interface that allows users to see a list of conversations, send and receive messages, and view the online status of contacts. The component should have a message input area, conversation thread display, and a contacts list sidebar.

components.name: button
components.usage: For sending messages after typing and for other interactive elements in the chat interface.

components.name: input
components.usage: For the message input field where users can type their messages.

components.name: avatar
components.usage: To display user and contact profile pictures in the conversation list and message thread.

components.name: badge
components.usage: To indicate unread message count or online status of the user.

components.name: card
components.usage: To encapsulate individual messages or chat bubbles in the conversation thread.

components.name: tooltip
components.usage: To provide additional information about buttons and other interactive elements when hovered, such as 'Send message', 'Attach file', etc.

components.name: tabs
components.usage: To allow users to switch between different conversation threads easily.
